details:
noun
- changing location rapidly
= synonyms: speeding
- a central nervous system stimulant that increases energy and decreases appetite
= synonyms: upper, amphetamine, pep pill
- a rate, usually rapid, at which something happens
= example: a rate, usually rapid, at which something happens
= synonyms: fastness, swiftness
- the ratio of the focal length to the diameter of a (camera) lens system
= synonyms: focal ratio, f number, stop number
- distance travelled per unit time
= synonyms: velocity
verb
- move faster
= synonyms: quicken, accelerate, speed up
- cause to move faster
= synonyms: accelerate, speed up
- move very fast
= example: move very fast
= synonyms: hurry, zip, travel rapidly
- travel at an excessive or illegal velocity
= example: travel at an excessive or illegal velocity
- move fast
= synonyms: hotfoot, rush, race, hasten, hie, pelt along, rush along, cannonball along, bucket along, belt along, step on it
